title: T206 Bill O'Hara St. Louis - PSA 1.5 - SOLD
author: t206kid

posts.post_title: T206 Bill O'Hara St. Louis - PSA 1.5 - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Amazing looking Bill O'Hara STL...one of the toughest cards of the set (scarcity #5).  Small paper loss on the front holding it back from a 3.

SOLD
